library(tidyverse)
library(cem)

## LeLonde

```{r}
data(LeLonde)

Le <- data.frame(na.omit(LeLonde))

Le %>% glimpse()

mat <- cem(treatment = "treated", data = Le, drop = "re78", keep.all=TRUE)

dfweighted = bind_cols(mat$X, wt = mat$w)
glimpse(dfweighted)

```
